definitions.text: an instrumentality invented for a particular purpose
examples: the device is small enough to wear on your wrist
a device intended to conserve water

definitions.text: something in an artistic work designed to achieve a particular effect

examples: he would stoop to any device to win a point
it was a great sales gimmick
a cheap promotions gimmick for greedy businessmen

definitions.text: any ornamental pattern or design (as in embroidery)

examples: he was recognized by the device on his shield
